description: Crews say they wore breathing apparatus and used hose reel jets to extinguish the blaze.
title: Norwich house fire tackled by crews
title_page: Norwich house fire tackled by crews - BBC News
maintext:
Four people were forced to flee a house after a kitchen fire.
Norfolk Fire and Rescue Service was called to Aylsham Road in Norwich at 20:30 GMT on Wednesday.
The house had been evacuated before the service arrived and crews suspected the blaze was started by a chip pan.
A spokesperson said officers wore breathing apparatus, used hose reel jets and checked hot spots using a thermal imaging camera.
